org.sleeper.propclasses.dataprocessor_manager

Class clDataTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sleeper.propclasses.dataprocessor_manager.clDataTimer

  • public class clDataTimer
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides interface to synchronized timer tasks. This class uses one timer thread and every listener is processed in that thread. It synchronize timer period with least-common-devisor period between periods of listeners so users are recommended to have their listeners have common divisor between their periods.
